original: Eugenics Incorporated - bringing new meaning to the term 'impeccable breeding'!
translated: 优基因公司——赋予「优生优育」全新的含义！

original: Your sperm, our sperm; your eggs, our eggs: the options are endless. It's amazing what you can keep in a vat of liquid nitrogen!
translated: 你们的精子就是我们的精子，你们的卵子就是我们的卵子。选择是无穷无尽的。液氮罐里可以放下各种东西！

original: Eugenics Incorporated is your one-stop-shop for tailor-made tots. Why not outsource your offspring altogether? We have harvested huge numbers of elite-selected eggs, truck-loads of grade-A sperm and we have thousands of desperate young women on our books ready and willing to play host to your god-like gestation.
translated: 优基因公司是你的一站式婴儿定制商城。何不把你的后代外包给我们呢？我们有大量精选卵子，海量A级精子，名册上还有成千上万的年轻女性愿意当你家神童的代孕妈妈。

original: Ordering your baby-in-a-box from Eugenics Incorporated couldn't be easier. Check out our Perfect Progeny Package.
translated: 向优基因公司订购你的完美宝宝非常简单。看看我们的完美后代套装吧。

original: - Order the Eugenics Incorporated Catalogue
translated: －订购优基因公司产品目录

original: - Select from a huge range of physical options including face shape, body type, hair color, breast size, height, weight, ethnicity, etc...
translated: －选择各种身体属性，包括但不限于脸型、体型、发色、胸部大小、身高、体重、种族...

original: - Specify IQ:
translated: －指定IQ：

original: Over 140 - Genius
translated: 大于 140－天才

original: 120 - 140 - Very superior intelligence
110 - 119 - Superior intelligence
90 - 109 - Normal or average intelligence
We specialize in creating gifted children who detest their imbecilic parents!
translated: 创造讨厌自己低能父母的神童是我们的专业！

original: - Pick 10 dominant personality traits from a massive selection. Here are just a few of the options available on our genetic menu. From A-Z, we've got you covered!
translated: －从特征库中挑选10个主要人格特质。以下是部分可选选项。从A到Z，我们全都有！

original: Assertive, Butch, Clumsy, Democrat, Evil, Forgetful, Gossipy, Hermitic, Insecure, Jealous, Kind, Lucky, Machiavellian, Neurotic, Optimistic, Promiscuous, Quarterback, Romantic, Snobbish, Thrifty, Unhinged, Vain, Workaholic, Xenophobic, Yodeling, Zany.
translated: 爱管闲事、笨手笨脚、仇视外人、大度豁达、丢三落四、恶贯满盈、疯疯癫癫、孤傲不群、滑稽可笑、荒淫无度、嫉妒心强、狂妄自大、浪漫柔情、民主主义、怒气冲冲、平易近人、气傲心高、任劳任怨、省吃俭用、铁腕人物、唯利是图、唯唯诺诺、邪魔外道、幸运不断、忧郁悲观、趾高气扬。

original: Please allow 9 months for delivery. Eugenics Inc reserves the right to start over based on ultrasound results not to its liking.
translated: 耐心等待九个月后方可交付。在超声结果不尽人意时，优基因公司保留打回重做的相关权利。

original: Tip of the day from Dr. Von Singer!
translated: 来自Von Singer博士的提醒！

original: "Remember, too much perfection is boring. To avoid ending up with a narcissistic sociopath, try to mix things up a bit. Throw in some quirks like lactose-intolerance or a limp. You don't want a kid who's too benevolent in case he can't stand up for himself against the genetically-deficient cretins in the schoolyard. Bullet-proof skin has been a big seller for us this year."
translated: 「记住，过于完美会很无聊。为了避免得到一个自恋的反社会者，也要稍微留一些缺陷。可以适当加入乳糖不耐受、腿瘸这样的负面特征。你也不会希望自己的孩子太过善良，在学校里和那些基因劣势的白痴站在一起。防弹皮肤是今年最热门的基因。」

original: New in the 2008 catalogue!
translated: 2008版产品目录中的新品！

original: Tot Idol! We have profiled celebrities so that you can pick out the psychological, cognitive and behavioral traits that best match your favorite TV star.
translated: 小小偶像！我们收录了名人的数据，现在可以参照你最喜爱的偶像，为后代选择心理、认知、行为上的特征了。

original: Quality Control is very important to us. Any imperfect embryos are discarded or fed to the bioengineered super-hamsters that Dr. Von Singer made for April Fools Day last year.
translated: 我们十分重视品控。任何不完美的胚胎都会被丢弃，或是拿去喂Von Singer博士去年愚人节做的基因工程超级仓鼠。
